Description.SourceString: Crystal colors shift throughout gameplay. If a Hero has the same element as the crystals, that Hero will receive increased attack, and performing an action will recover health and mana for that Hero. Be careful - your enemies can also receive color match bonuses!
Description.LocalizedString: Crystal colors shift throughout gameplay. If a Hero has the same element as the crystals, that Hero will receive increased attack, and performing an action will recover health and mana for that Hero. Be careful - your enemies can also receive color match bonuses!
